name: Buffalo Chicken Dip from McCormick®
author: McCormick Spice
summary: Love the taste of Buffalo chicken wings? Try it in dip form! Served warm with carrots and celery sticks, this dip is loaded with chopped chicken, three types of cheese, sour cream and McCormick® Buffalo Wings Seasoning Mix – for that spicy hot sauce flavor you'll love. No matter the game score. With this dip, you'll always win.
ingredients: 1 (1.6 oz) package McCormick® Buffalo Wings Seasoning Mix
1 ½ cups shredded or chopped cooked chicken
directions: Mix cream cheese, sour cream, 1/2 cup of the Cheddar cheese and Seasoning Mix in medium bowl until well blended
Spoon into lightly greased pie plate
Top with remaining 1/2 cup Cheddar cheese
Bake 20 minutes or until heated through
Sprinkle with blue cheese, if desired
